Robert

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Transport of Fresh Fruit - West Africa to Singapore (Laycan and liner service)
email_chain.body:
Hi Robert,

Thank you for your inquiry. Yes, we do handle laycan and preferential liner services for shipments like yours. To best assist you, please contact our representatives in the relevant regions directly.

When requesting a quote, please provide as much detail as possible about the specific fruit, origin port, and desired delivery timeframe.

We strive to offer the most competitive freight rates for sea transport of fruits, vegetables, and other perishable goods. We have a network of professional and authorized representatives worldwide.

With our service, you will be provided with:

A) Shipment tracking service from origin to destination port
B) Free access to all cargo manifests
C) Arrangement of warehouse and storage space

Regards,
The Sales Team

email_chain.subject: Inquiry: 9,600 MT Sugar - Nouakchott to Kotka
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Bayuk,

I'm seeking a vessel to transport 9,600 MT of sugar from Nouakchott to Kotka. Could you please advise if you have a vessel available to load towards the end of September? If so, what is your standard laytime for this type of cargo and route?

Thank you,

Kelly Thompson

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: 9,600 MT Sugar - Nouakchott to Kotka
email_chain.body:
Hi Kelly,

In response to your inquiry regarding the sugar shipment to Kotka, unfortunately, loading at the end of September is not feasible for us. Our current schedule requires the vessel to be alongside in Nouakchott by August 25th at the latest, otherwise there will be significant delays on our end.

Kind regards,

Alasdair Bayuk

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: 9,600 MT Sugar - Nouakchott to Kotka
email_chain.body:
Alasdair,

Thank you for the quick response.

To clarify:

1. Please confirm your vessel's current position.
2. If you *can* commence loading before August 25th, please let me know. We currently do not have a confirmed vessel for this shipment.
3. What is the expected loading duration for the full 9,600 MT?

Regards,
Kelly Thompson

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: 9,600 MT Sugar - Nouakchott to Kotka
email_chain.body:
Kelly,

To reiterate:

1. Our position is that we cannot accommodate loading *later* than August 25th. The vessel *must* be ready to load *before* this date.
2. Please provide details of your nominated vessel and confirm its availability to load before August 25th. If you cannot fix a vessel to load before this date, loading will not be possible in Nouakchott with our services and you will need to find an alternative loading solution.

Regards,

Alasdair Bayuk

email_chain.subject: Inquiry Regarding Chemical Inc. and Naphtha Report
email_chain.body:
Bob,

I am intrigued by the media reports that your company is a potential acquisition target for Chemical Inc. Do you have any comments on this story?

I would also appreciate it if you could forward me your internal report on the market impact of the U.S. falling price of naphtha, thanks!

Cheers,
Martin

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry Regarding Chemical Inc. and Naphtha Report
email_chain.body:
Hi Martin,

This has to be a joke. I don't know of any report that suggests Chemical Inc. is a target for acquisition.

Bob

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry Regarding Chemical Inc. and Naphtha Report
email_chain.body:
Hi Bob,

No joke here. I just read in the news that "Chemical Inc. is reviewing its strategic alternatives." Does this mean that they are thinking of buying your company?

Cheers,
Martin

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry Regarding Chemical Inc. and Naphtha Report
email_chain.body:
No worries Martin,

We are watching the market closely. The naphtha market is hard to predict. We are all at the mercy of the OPEC production decisions. The question we are facing is whether we should buy long term or short term, or maybe even store. What are your thoughts on this?

Cheers,
Bob

email_chain.subject: Naphtha Price Movements - Input Request
email_chain.body:
Hi Bob,

I am an external consultant for Chemical Inc. I am currently preparing a report on the impact of naphtha price movements and I would appreciate your comments on this. You can reply via email or phone me direct at (123) 456-7890 and I will share it with my colleagues at Chemical Inc.

Cheers,
Martin

email_chain.subject: Follow up on Chemical Inc. Interview
email_chain.body:
Hi Bob,

The interview with the executive of Chemical Inc. did not help my research. I need more clarification.

email_chain.subject: Confidential Report on Naphtha Market
email_chain.body:
Hi Bob,

I have managed to get a draft copy of the report by the Chemical Inc. consultant on the naphtha market. I understand that this is a confidential document. Can you confirm that this is the case?

Cheers,
Martin

email_chain.subject: Impact of Naphtha Price Reduction
email_chain.body:
Hi Bob,

Can you comment on whether the announcement that the price of naphtha will be reduced by 1.5 percent will impact your business?

email_chain.subject: Coal Shipment Inquiry - Port Elizabeth to Cape Town
email_chain.body:
Hi Antonia,

We require approximately 6,000 MT of capacity for a coal shipment from Port Elizabeth to Cape Town next week. Do you have any open slots available?

Regards,
Martin

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment Inquiry - Port Elizabeth to Cape Town
email_chain.body:
Hi Martin,

Thanks for your inquiry. How would you like to handle pricing? We generally prefer Letters of Credit (LC), but Documents against Payment (DP) is also an option.

We also have 2 x 30m3 trucks available to transport the 20kg bags to the storage facility in Cape Town, should you require it.

Thanks,
Antonia

email_chain.subject: Re: Coal Shipment Inquiry - Port Elizabeth to Cape Town
email_chain.body:
Hi Antonia,

Thank you for your response. We will not accept a dry FOB price for this shipment. Please provide pricing based on a Letter of Credit.

Regards,
Martin

email_chain.subject: Re: Regarding Letter of Credit and Pricing - Ongoing Contract
email_chain.body:
Anthony,

I am writing regarding our ongoing contract.

I do not want a letter of credit as per my previous email about this specific shipment (replying to Antonia). I require a letter of credit per the email 2 that I received from you previously for our *ongoing* contract.

You can reply here, to me, or at martin@example.com.

And as I said, I do not want to discuss dry FOB pricing as per my previous email about this specific shipment (replying to Antonia).

Regards,
Martin

email_chain.subject: Re: Regarding Letter of Credit and Pricing - Ongoing Contract
email_chain.body:
Anthony,

Thank you for your reply. I will ensure this misunderstanding is avoided in future contracts.

Regards,
Martin

email_chain.subject: Inquiry: 5,000 tons Palm Oil - Bintulu to Tocumen
email_chain.body:
I'm interested in moving 5,000 tons of palm oil from Bintulu to Tocumen (Panama). Freight and laycan is negotiable, so please respond with an offer.

Best,
Monet

email_chain.subject: Palm Oil Agency Opportunity - Colombia to Tocumen
email_chain.body:
Dear Monet,

My name is Olga, and I am the Director of the International Department at Colombia Palm Oil, one of the largest palm oil exporters in Colombia.

I am writing to offer you the opportunity to act as our agent for deliveries of 5,000 tons of palm oil from Colombia to Tocumen (Panama).

If you are interested in cooperating with our company, we can sign an agency contract and begin export-import operations immediately.

Could you please let me know your agency commission for this type of shipment? What are your thoughts on this opportunity?

Best regards,
Olga

email_chain.subject: Re: Palm Oil Agency Opportunity - Colombia to Tocumen
email_chain.body:
Dear Monet,

My name is Colibri, and I am the Manager at Colombia Palm Oil. This email confirms our interest in your potential agency services in Panama for the delivery of 5,000 tons of palm oil to Tocumen.

As requested, we offer a commission of $5 per ton. This will be formalized in the contract.

Following your response, I can arrange a video conference to discuss all the details of the agreement and initiate operations promptly.

Looking forward to your reply,
Colibri

email_chain.subject: Bintulu Palm Oil Offer: 5,000 Tons to Tocumen
email_chain.body:
Hi,

This may be the most cost-effective way to sell our surplus palm oil to the buyer in Panama.

Our company has over 100,000 tons of palm oil available from Bintulu, and we would like to sell 5,000 tons to this buyer, with the potential to supply more in the future.

We are willing to offer you $1 per ton commission. For example, if you sell the 5,000 tons at $9.95 per ton, you will earn $4.95 per ton.

Please let me know if you are interested.

Regards,
Ivan

email_chain.subject: Cargo Inquiry - Casablanca
email_chain.body:
Dear Vessel Operator,

Please confirm your vessel's availability for a potential cargo shipment. Kindly provide the following details:

*   Draft requirements
*   Earliest date available to commence loading
*   Estimated Time of Arrival (ETA) Casablanca

Thank you for your time.

Best regards,
Jane Doe

email_chain.subject: Upcoming Cargo Loading Forecast - January
email_chain.body:
Dear Shippers,

Our team is currently compiling a cargo loading forecast for the upcoming month, which will be circulated to all shippers during the first week of January.

If you have numerous vessels scheduled to sail within that period, please confirm the earliest expected sailing dates for each vessel to help us avoid potential double bookings.

Thank you for your cooperation.

Best regards,
Jane Doe

email_chain.subject: Offer: 2000 x 20ft Reefer Containers - Aqaba to Tripoli
email_chain.body:
Good day Hong,

Thanks for your interest in purchasing empty containers from us. Our containers are currently located in Aqaba, with the intended port of discharge being Tripoli. We believe the following offer may be of interest to you:

2,000 x 20ft reefer containers - Available Free of Cost

Please advise if this offer is still of interest to you.

Thank you.

Regards,

Ms. Banks
HNB International LLC

email_chain.subject: Re: Offer: 2000 x 20ft Reefer Containers - Aqaba to Tripoli
email_chain.body:
Good morning Ms. Banks,

Thank you for your email and inquiry.

Could you clarify whether HNB International LLC is a trading house or a trading firm?

Has your company previously traded with the Gulf region, or purchased containers from the Middle East?

If you are serious about this business opportunity, I would like to invite you to consider becoming an agent of HNB International LLC. As an agent, you would resell our products in your country, and we would potentially buy them back from you for further resale to local customers or for re-exportation.

To proceed, you would need to establish a local bank account. This would allow us to process your purchase orders.

I would be happy to assist with processing all necessary documentation to initiate the transaction. Please provide the requested information, and I will forward the agency contract to you.

Please note that I am not familiar with the regulations and business practices in your country, and therefore...

email_chain.subject: Urgent Transport Request: Stockholm to Oslo - IT Equipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Mjönes,

We have two pallets of IT equipment that need to be moved from Stockholm to Oslo ASAP. The estimated value of the goods is between $40,000 and $50,000. Could you arrange pickup in Stockholm on Monday, October 28th and delivery in Oslo before Friday, November 1st?

We look forward to working with you on this project.

Sincerely,
Ulf Vikman

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent Transport Request: Stockholm to Oslo - IT Equipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Vikman,

Thank you for your email. 

Our client requires the goods to be picked up on Monday, October 28th, ideally with same-day dispatch. They need the delivery to occur in Oslo by Thursday morning, October 31st. 

Please confirm if this expedited timeline is feasible by this evening. 

Thank you for your assistance.

Sincerely,
Anna Mjönes

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent Transport Request: Stockholm to Oslo - IT Equipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Ms. Mjönes,

Yes, we can arrange delivery by Thursday morning, October 31st. We can schedule a pickup from your client's warehouse in Stockholm this afternoon, Monday, October 28th, for immediate dispatch.

Furthermore, we understand that your client requires a clean bill of lading. We will ensure this is provided.

Please confirm if this arrangement meets your needs.

Thank you for your business.

Sincerely,
Ulf Vikman

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent Transport Request: Stockholm to Oslo - IT Equipment
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Vikman,

That is perfect. Yes, our client specifically requires a clean bill of lading, so we appreciate you confirming that.

We will forward the bill of lading to you this evening. Can you please arrange the pickup directly with our client on Monday, October 28th? They should be available at their warehouse from 8 AM to 6 PM. Please confirm if these hours are acceptable for your pickup schedule.

Thank you for your help.

Sincerely,
Anna Mjönes

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent Transport Request: Stockholm to Oslo - IT Equipment - Bill of Lading Address
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Vikman,

My colleagues and I have reviewed the draft bill of lading you sent. We noticed that our company address is missing. We need to ensure that the address is included and correct before finalizing the document.

Could you please check and verify the address on the bill of lading and send us a revised version?

Thank you for your help.

Sincerely,
Anna Mjönes

email_chain.subject: Re: Urgent Transport Request: Stockholm to Oslo - IT Equipment - Bill of Lading Address
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Vikman,

Thank you for sending the updated bill of lading. I spoke with my colleagues and we've reviewed the address. It looks correct on our end. However, could you please double-check on your side to ensure the address on the bill of lading matches your records? Just want to be certain everything is accurate.

Let me know if you have any questions.

Thank you for your help.

Sincerely,
Anna Mjönes

email_chain.subject: Freight Quote Request: 20 Pallets Melamine Chairs - Hong Kong to Las Vegas
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Blanc,

Our company requires urgent delivery of 20 pallets of yellow melamine plastic chairs. These need to be moved from Hong Kong to Las Vegas.

Please can you advise the cost of this delivery, with arrival no later than the end of January?

Regards,
Maxine

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote Request: 20 Pallets Melamine Chairs - Hong Kong to Las Vegas
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Blanc,

Apologies, please disregard my previous email. I sent it in error. 

Instead, we have an urgent need for 100 stainless steel container bins in the Las Vegas area. We need to arrange delivery to Las Vegas by the end of January. Can you advise the cost of these products delivered?

Regards,
Maxine

email_chain.subject: Re: Freight Quote Request: 20 Pallets Melamine Chairs - Hong Kong to Las Vegas
email_chain.body:
Dear Mr. Blanc,

Thank you for your quote of $4500 for the 100 stainless steel bins. 

We are also looking for a price for 100 yellow melamine plastic chairs with the following dimensions:

* 700mm high
* 700mm deep
* 700mm wide

Please can you provide the total cost, including delivery to Las Vegas by the end of January 2020?

Regards,
Maxine

email_chain.subject: Inquiry: MV Secoya ETA

Looking forward to your reply.

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: MV Secoya ETA - Further Follow Up

email_chain.subject: Urgent: Trucking Rate Request - Vancouver Relocation and Distribution
email_chain.body:
Good morning Tony,

We have cargo loaded in Vancouver and are looking for a location to reload into drums. It's crude palm oil (2% max water, 2% max sulfur, 20-30 deg API). Approximately 2700 drums of 150kg each.

We need a truckload rate from Vancouver to locations in Western Ontario, Canada and potentially the United States.

Drum Specifications:
*   Dimensions: 12.5" diameter, 35" height
*   Features: 2 handles, screw-on caps, 4 labels on the sides
*   Lining: Nylon lined
*   Packaging: Outer box for protection

The shipper is prepared to pick up the drums and outer boxes from your location.

Let me know if you have any questions. Thanks for your help.

Best regards,
Bryan
